## Code Style

## Project-Specific Rules
- Workspace targets .NET Framework 4.0, .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Standard 2.0, and .NET Core 2.0; consider when modifying code if relevant.
- Be mindful of memory limitations and optimize code accordingly.
